attributes.action: Remove David Cameron From Cabinet by Vote of No Confidence
attributes.additional_details:
Under his reign we have lost confidence in the system, been sent into war, had our education put on hold and have had major economic stalls. He does not listen and he seems to not care.


http://www.greenbenchesuk.com/2015/01/100-biggest-failures-of-david-camerons.html

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Motion_of_no_confidence

http://www.independent.co.uk/student/news/spending-review-2015-government-betrays-a-generation-of-students-by-secretly-backtracking-on-a-2012-a6748801.html
attributes.background:
David Cameron is leading britain to a national mockery and creating an image of parliament to the public which is: untrusting, uncaring and liars. 

He is therefore a danger to parliament and also the UK population and should be removed by a 'motion of no confidence' to prevent further harm.
